description:
welcome to this free course on how to create a logo with adobe illustrator.

Throughout this course you will learn how to create a nice logo using adobe illustrator in just few minutes and without any drawing skills following the same method I used to create my own logo for my own YouTube channel.

this course covers how to add the shapes to your canvas, then we move to assembling them, and once we are happy i will show you how to add color and special effects to bring some beauty.

my goal with this course is to make you confident and ready to start your logo design journey.

I want to precise that the course is not for people who already know the basics of logo design, but if you are a complete beginner and want to learn something  new in illustrator than wait no longer and take this course.
title: how to create a logo for your youtube channel in no time
